name: ts-rpc-http
description: Quickly generate a typesafe RPC API over HTTP with Express along with a typesafe rxjs client

scripts.build: rm -Rf dist && tsc && cp src/template.handlebars dist/
scripts.package: npm run build && cp package.json dist && cp README.md dist && cp -R bin dist && cd dist && npm pack
scripts.publish: npm run package && cd dist && npm publish ts-rpc-http*.tgz
